manifest.name: Peerdraft
manifest.description: Real-time, instant collaboration on Obsidian documents or folders. Whether for quick note-taking or building a team knowledge base, Peerdaft syncs with your collaborators' Obsidian vaults and also offers a Web Editor.
manifest.author: Peerdraft
